subject: Rugby (Game)
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: Australia, Wales and New Zealand all made it to the quarterfinals with an attacking style of play, and they do not see a need to be more conservative now, even in the knockout rounds.
snippet: Australia, Wales and New Zealand all made it to the quarterfinals with an attacking style of play, and they do not see a need to be more conservative now, even in the knockout rounds.
